The reasons why the Realized One doesn't: When a mendicant has faith but doesn’t approach
When a mendicant has faith and approaches, but doesn’t pay homage
When a mendicant pays homage, but doesn’t ask questions
When a mendicant asks questions, but doesn’t lend an ear
When a mendicant lends an ear, but doesn’t remember the teachings
When a mendicant remembers the teachings, but doesn’t reflect on the meaning
When a mendicant reflects on the meaning, but doesn’t practice accordingly
When a mendicant practices accordingly, but they’re not a good speaker
When a mendicant is a good speaker, but they don’t educate, encourage, fire up, and inspire their spiritual companions.
